/**
 * Format trait name for display by replacing underscores with spaces
 * and capitalizing each word.
 * 
 * @param {string} name - Raw trait name (e.g., "genuine_care")
 * @returns {string} - Formatted name (e.g., "Genuine Care")
 */export const formatTraitName=name=>{if(!name||typeof name!=='string')return'';return name.split('_').map(word=>word.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+word.slice(1).toLowerCase()).join(' ');};/**
 * Format trait name for display (lowercase with spaces)
 * 
 * @param {string} name - Raw trait name (e.g., "genuine_care")
 * @returns {string} - Formatted name (e.g., "genuine care")
 */export const formatTraitNameLowercase=name=>{if(!name||typeof name!=='string')return'';return name.replace(/_/g,' ');};
